introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is NanoBanana AI
introduce.label: About
introduce.description: NanoBanana is an advanced AI-powered image editing platform that transforms your photos with simple natural language commands.

items.title: Natural Language Editing
items.description: Simply describe what you want to change in plain English, and our AI will understand and execute your vision.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Get professional-quality edits in seconds without learning complex software or techniques.

items.title: Multiple AI Models
items.description: Powered by the latest AI models including Gemini 2.5 Flash for the best editing results.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Use NanoBanana AI
usage.description: Edit your images in three simple steps:

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Drag and drop or click to upload any image from your device or paste from clipboard.

items.title: Describe Your Edit
items.description: Write a simple description of what you want to change, add, or remove from the image.

items.title: Get Instant Results
items.description: Our AI processes your request and delivers professional-quality results in seconds.

items.title: Download & Share
items.description: Save your edited image in high resolution or share it directly to social media platforms.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about NanoBanana AI image editing

items.title: How does NanoBanana AI work?
items.description: NanoBanana AI uses advanced machine learning models including Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash to understand your text descriptions and apply sophisticated image editing techniques. Simply upload an image, describe what you want to change, and our AI does the rest.

items.title: Do I need any design experience to use NanoBanana?
items.description: Not at all! NanoBanana AI is designed for everyone. You just need to describe what you want in plain English. Our AI understands natural language and translates your words into professional image edits.

items.title: What types of edits can I make?
items.description: You can remove objects, add new elements, change backgrounds, modify colors, enhance resolution, apply artistic styles, and much more. If you can describe it, our AI can likely do it.

items.title: How long does it take to process an image?
items.description: Most edits are completed in 5-15 seconds, depending on the complexity of your request and image size. Our AI models are optimized for speed while maintaining high quality results.

items.title: What image formats are supported?
items.description: We support all common image formats including JPG, PNG, WebP, and HEIC. You can upload images up to 50MB in size and our AI will maintain the original quality in your edited results.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many images I can edit?
items.description: Free users get 10 edits per month. Our Pro plan offers unlimited edits, priority processing, higher resolution outputs, and advanced features like batch processing.
